name: Squire Short Sword, 65cm
description: Our Squire Short Sword is a short hybrid latex sword inspired from traditional medieval swords. The tapered latex blade has a central ridge. The crossguard and grip is made from flexible polyurethane foam then hand painted to look like real wood and brass fittings. Length: 65cm

name: Spartha Short Sword, 60cm
description: The Hybrid Spartha Short Sword inspired from the Roman Gladius. This simple double edged latex blade has a double fuller. The polyurethane foam hilt is far more rich in detail and provides a firm grip on the weapon. This sword was built to withstand the tests of time. Length: 60cm

name: Short Trench Knife, 60cm
description: The hybrid Trench Knife has a single edged latex blade with a detailed polyurethane foam handle with simulated wood grain. The knuckle duster protects your fingers in combat which is exactly what any good soldier needs. Length: 60cm

name: Ranger Short Sword, 60cm
description: The hybrid Ranger Short Sword is the perfect side arm for any larp fighter. The polyurethane foam handle features an intricate curved design with leather grip and the blade is made from foam coated in a durable latex coating. Length: 60cm

name: Small Sword, 60cm
description: The Small Sword is a type of gentlemanâ€™s sword or dueling sword. This larp sword is rich in detail showcasing the aristocracy of weaponry. The short straight foam blade is secured to a beautiful polyurethane foam hilt and has a real leather grip. Length: 60cm

name: Elven Short Sword, 60cm
description: If you are an elven hunter, then you will need this exceptional hybrid Elven Short Sword. The blade is made from shred proof foam coated in a thick latex coating. The detailed polyurethane foam handle is hand painted in rich colors with real woodgrain effects. Length: 60cm

name: Cutlass Short Sword, 70cm
description: The hybrid Cutlass Short Sword is ideal for any pirate or swashbuckler but can easily be used by any warrior. The short-curved scimitar style latex blade has a single cutting edge and has a flexible polyurethane foam handle with simulated wood grip. A safe weapon for cutthroats and scoundrels. Length: 70cm

name: Jian Short Sword, 75cm
description: Our Jian Short Sword is a slender yet elegant larp sword from our hybrid collection. This small sword has a strong latex blade accentuated by a richly detailed polyurethane handle hand painted to perfection. Become the one true master at your larp. Length: 75cm

name: Sabre Short Sword, 60cm
description: The hybrid Sabre Short Sword has a sturdy chopping blade with a protective crossguard that is similar to a Bowie Knife. This curved blade is made from foam then coated in a thick latex. The handle is made from polyurethane foam and is hand painted to give realistic feel to the blade. Length: 60cm

name: Wakizashi Short Sword, 60cm
description: The Wakizashi is an oriental inspired short sword that was once wielded by the Samurai warrior and assassins alike. The polyurethane foam handle was cast then hand painted. The slightly curled blade has a single cutting edge and was intended to withstand hash larp combat. Length: 60cm

name: Viking Short Sword, 60cm
description: The Viking Short Sword is a weapon symbolic of wealth and status wielded by hordes of Vikings. Designed to be a lightweight yet strong weapon this larp sword has a soft polyurethane foam handle with leather grip and a safe foam blade coated in thick latex. Length: 60cm

name: Crusader Short Sword, 70cm
description: Whether you are a knight embarking on his first adventure or a seasoned knight. The Crusader Short sword is a part of our Hybrid collection combining a polyurethane handle with a thick latex blade allowing you to go forth with confidence in your Larp weapon.
